function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to engage tourists in conservation efforts and environmental awareness.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on potential over credentials in hiring process could lead to increased risk of contagious diseases in the workplace if health status is not properly assessed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for human health and well-being in favor of economic recovery may lead to increased risk of public health crises, including contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on community thinking may not always be practical or efficient in solving problems.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inequality in modern society due to emphasis on individualism over community spirit.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on communal support for renovation work may pose health risks during contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Waste management program generating revenues from plastic waste","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversification of revenue streams including f&b, spa treatments, and transports","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Bringing sanitary and bedding materials from the capital may introduce contagious diseases from outside the local area.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Joint activities with local communities may increase the risk of disease transmission due to close contact and shared resources.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of local infrastructure to support covid-19 response","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on traditional medicine for virus protection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to clean water and sanitation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious disease transmission in the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on external resources for the service industry","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of diversification in activities leading to inflexibility","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to increased tourism in the region","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disconnecting from over-connected life may impact awareness of health and safety measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased contact with nature may expose visitors to environmental health risks","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within local communities and among international visitors due to close interaction and collaboration.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of social promiscuity leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of pollution contributing to the spread of diseases and harming public health.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of unsustainable income sources contributing to public health challenges among local populations.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of automation, machine learning, and artificial intelligence in customer service","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on global production plants and suppliers, leading to vulnerability during lockdowns and social distancing measures","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on people-intensive service businesses due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Innovation in business models to cope with the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai and ml for disease outbreak prediction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate identification of potential drugs for clinical trials","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid capture of varied information from the environment","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Millions of data points pouring in from various sources","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Capturing contactless screening data from millions of patients","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Skyrocketing calls to service centers in airline, hospitality, banking industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increasing reliance on chatbots for customer service","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of automation and ai in service businesses may reduce the need for human interaction, potentially limiting the spread of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drone delivery and robot-powered delivery vehicles may minimize the need for human delivery personnel, reducing the potential for disease transmission through human contact.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of economic revenue in a business model due to the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimized philanthropic contributions","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Underutilized spare capacity during covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of revenue leading to industry distress","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential health risks from conducting humanitarian missions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate employee training and education levels may lead to ineffective delivery of new services, such as online cooking classes and web-based services.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Significant decrease in demand for air travel and car rental services due to the covid-19 pandemic.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tinkering with the demand and supply chain may lead to compromised productive capacity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusive shopping hours for vulnerable customers may not effectively minimize out-of-stock situations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Service firms may struggle to create new meaning for customers during shelter at home orders","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity to de-densify small premises leading to limited social distancing measures.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial investments required for strategic partnerships and web design for delivery services.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"}]}
